text: Jafarabad or Jaffarabad () district is in the southeast of the Pakistani province of Balochistan. ==Administration== The district of Jaffarabad is administratively subdivided into the following tehsils: * Jhat Pat Tehsil * Usta Mohammad Tehsil * Gandakha Tehsil * Suhbat Nagar Tehsil Category:Districts of Balochistan (Pakistan)
title: Jaffarabad District
